title: Cant find fiora in my champion pool
body: So recently I decided to play fiora in a ranked game, however I could not find her manually or by searching her. Is it just me or is anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body: i wish all my top laners had as much awareness as you kappa
She's been temporarily disabled due to an in-game bug. You should able to see Riot's notice on the exclamation mark icon in the client.
